echos/
                47 90/
                farmer 43 91 1 Abigail 47 87 0/
                skippable/
                addLantern 735 46 86 1/
                move farmer 1 0 0/
                move farmer 0 -4 1/
                emote farmer 8/
                move farmer 2 0 1/
                pause 200/
                showFrame Abigail 32/
                jump Abigail 8/
                showFrame Abigail 0/
                faceDirection Abigail 3/
                speak Abigail "Whoa, hey!$7#$b#I didn't expect to see anyone here, especially in the graveyard at this hour.$7"/
                pause 400/
                speak Abigail "I mean, it's a bit unconventional, I guess.$1#$b#But I find places like this strangely fascinating.$0#$b#The eeriness, the stories that might be hidden within the tombstones.$0"/
                faceDirection Abigail 0/
                pause 400/
                speak Abigail "This tombstone is in honor of a great adventure.$0"/
                pause 200/
                faceDirection Abigail 3/
                pause 300/
                speak Abigail "You know, I'm really into adventure stories.$0#$b#The idea of exploring mysterious places, finding hidden treasures, uncovering ancient secrets.$0#$b#It's all so thrilling.$1"/
                pause 500/
                speak Abigail "There's this book I've been reading, about this daring adventurer called Mona and the quests they undertook.$0#$b#It's got me daydreaming about having my own adventure someday, even if it's not as dangerous.$4"/
                emote farmer 32/
                pause 300/
                speak Abigail "Maybe it's just the romanticized idea of it all, but exploring and discovering the unknown...$0#$b#it's kind of a rush, don't you think?$4"/
                quickQuestion #Agree with Abigail.#Disagree with Abigail.(break)speak Abigail "Right?$1#$b#I'm glad you see it that way too.$1"\friendship Abigail 20(break)speak Abigail "Hmm...$8#$b#Maybe it's just me then.$9"\friendship Abigail -20 /
                speak Abigail "You know, there's a particular tale in that book where the adventurer explores an ancient vulcanic ruin, facing traps and solving puzzles to reach a hidden chamber.$0#$b#The way the author describes the adrenaline of uncovering forgotten history, it's mesmerizing.$0#$b#Makes me want to experience that kind of excitement, even if it's on a smaller scale.$1"/
                move Abigail 0 2 2/
                faceDirection Abigail 3/
                pause 600/
                faceDirection Abigail 1/
                pause 600/
                move Abigail 0 -2 3/
                speak Abigail "I believe we are actually alone.$0#$b#So I'm going to share a secret with you.$4#$b#I've been secretly practicing my sword skills in the hopes of being ready for any unexpected adventure.$0#$b#Don't tell anyone, though!$1"/
                pause 600/
                emote Abigail 40/
                speak Abigail "So, have you ever daydreamed about going on an adventure, exploring uncharted territory?$0"/
                quickQuestion #'Yes, I do quite often.'#'I don't really think about exploring.'(break)friendship Abigail 30\speak Abigail "Interesting!$1#$b#It's amazing how stories and dreams can inspire us.$0#$b#Who knows, maybe we'll have our own adventure right here in Pelican Town one day.$1"(break)friendship Abigail -20\speak Abigail "Well you should really try...$8#$b#Before you moved in that house, I was exploring the farmland quite frequently.$9" /
                pause 500/
                speak Abigail "It's getting quite late.$0#$b#I should have been home hours ago.$1#$b#Please don't tell my parents you saw me here.$0"/
                move Abigail 0 4 2/
                faceDirection farmer 2/
                move Abigail -3 0 3/
                pause 700/
                emote Abigail 40/
                pause 200/
                speed Abigail 4/
                move Abigail 2 0 0/
                speed Abigail 4/
                move Abigail 0 -3 0/
                speak Abigail "Oh and thanks for joining me here, even if it's a bit unusual.$0#$b#I really enjoy talking with you about this stuff.$0"/
                pause 200/
                emote farmer 32/
                speak Abigail "Anyways, bye!$1"/
                addConversationTopic abigailNotHome 1/
                advancedMove Abigail false 0 3 -7 0 3 1000/
                pause 800/
                end

Entries.abigailNotHome: I have this strange feeling that Abigail was up to something last night...$2#$b#I just can't quite put my finger on it.$2
Abigail seemed a bit restless this morning.$2#$e#I wonder if something was on her mind.$2#$b#She's been a bit elusive about her activities.$2#$b#Young hearts, always seeking excitement!$1
Hey, did you notice my parents acting a bit off today?$3#$b#I think they might've caught on that I sneaked out to the graveyard last night.$1#$b#Oops!$1
